author: gakonst
content: Should we set a timeline deadline for devnet-1?

author: ralexstokes
content:
i think we will have devnet-1 CL specs by EOW (unless something unexpected comes up on thursdays call), and i think the devnet-1 EL specs are mostly hammered out somewhere

from there devnet-1 will happen once a critical mass of client teams have implemented the specs
